Load concept data

Source: R/concept-load.R
load_concept.Rd

Data specified as concept objects is loaded, aggregated per combination of id and time-step and merged into wide format.

load_concepts(concepts, aggregate = NA_character_, merge_data = TRUE, ...)

load_concept(concept, aggregate = NA_character_, na_rm = TRUE, ...)

Arguments

concepts

Vector of concept objects to be loaded
aggregate

Controls how data within concepts is aggregated
merge_data

Logical flag, specifying whether to merge concepts into wide format or return a list, each entry corresponding to a concept
...

Passed to load_concept() and on to load_items()
concept

Single concept object to be loaded
na_rm

Logical flag, indicating whether to remove NA rows

Contents

Developed by Nicolas Bennett.
